Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS_INS_SP" ( P_PERMISSION_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_COMPLEX_PERMISSION_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_PERMISSION_VALUE IN NUMBER, P_IS_SYSTEM IN NUMBER, P_IS_ACTIVE IN NUMBER, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1 ) IS V_ID NUMBER; BEGIN SELECT CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS_S1.NEXTVAL INTO V_ID FROM DUAL; INSERT INTO CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS ( ID, PERMISSION_CODE, PERMISSION_VALUE, PERMISSION_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) SELECT V_ID, P_PERMISSION_CODE, P_PERMISSION_VALUE, P.ID, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY FROM CMN_SEC_PERMISSIONS P WHERE P.PERMISSION_CODE = P_COMPLEX_PERMISSION_CODE AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'PERMISSION ELEMENT ALREADY EXISTS' FROM CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS PE, CMN_SEC_PERMISSIONS P1 WHERE P1.ID = PE.PERMISSION_ID AND P1.PERMISSION_CODE = P_COMPLEX_PERMISSION_CODE AND PE.PERMISSION_CODE = P_PERMISSION_CODE); END;
